channel.title: ShadowScape Revamped [VPS] [Needs staff]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/shadowscapebanner_zps3356fb7a.png[/img]
Hello everyone! I am here to introduce you back to ShadowScape! We used to be a server but then we went down for a little while, but we are back now! And even better now! This server is still like brand new. Theres no players, no staff, or anything right now. So therefore, I will also be looking for staff members! It is also ran off of a VPS, so there shouldn't be much downtime.
[B]This server is still a work in progress, so if you want a fully done server with no bugs or anything at all.. this server is not for you.[/B]
--------------------------------- exp isn't extremely fast constant updates Friendly owner brand new server tons of bosses nice eco I could go on for a while, just come give it a try.
You can find our client at: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/8nld8erq2u1gz57/Play%20ShadowScape.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAHzKPA_9PKx0Dyg6uoTfwulenYvlII3ESwRn_3sMmOtsg]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/8nld8erq2u1gz57/Play%20ShadowScape.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAHzKPA_9PKx0Dyg6uoTfwulenYvlII3ESwRn_3sMmOtsg[/url] And our forums at: [url=http://realshadowscape.tk/]ShadowScape - Index[/url]
I hope to see you soon!
Here's a couple pics and whatnot, sorry thaeres not many.... [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/farming_zpsf0e5f962.png[/img] [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/home_zps0d03a28a.png[/img] [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/mining_zps65a3a96c.png[/img] [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/login_zps2cb47858.png[/img] [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/moneypouch_zps4c56885d.png[/img] [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/login2_zps615620b4.png[/img] [img]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m154/jeremy422/minigames_zps7d530375.png[/img]

item.title: ShadowScape Revamped [VPS] [Needs staff]

item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

Hello everyone! I am here to introduce you back to ShadowScape! We used to be a server but then we went down for a little while,
but we are back now! And even better now!
This server is still like brand new. Theres no players, no staff, or anything right now. So therefore, I will also be looking for staff
members! It is also ran off of a VPS, so there shouldn’t be much downtime.

[B]This server is still a work in progress, so if you want a fully done server with no bugs or anything at all… this server is not for you.[/B]

exp isn’t extremely fast
constant updates
Friendly owner
brand new server
tons of bosses
nice eco
I could go on for a while, just come give it a try.

You
can find our client at: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/8nld8erq2u1gz57/Play%20ShadowScape.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAHzKPA_9PKx0Dyg6uoTfwulenYvlII3ESwRn_3sMmOtsg
And our forums at: ShadowScape - Index

I hope to see you soon!
